description:
Karino figures out why Kotarou talks the way he does: he`s copying Tonosaman, his favorite cartoon character from a show that`s about to end.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Tonosaman no Tokubetsu / Tonosaman no Saigo / Furo Soudou / Kuma! / Hare no Hi no Menmen / Konbini Bentou kara no......
とのさまんの特別 / とのさまんの最後 / フロ騒動 / クマ! / 晴れの日の面々 / コンビニ弁当からの......
